select tbp.BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM, tbp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, tbp.BILL_ORDER_NUM, tbp.USER_NUM as USER_NUM, tbp.BILL_PRODUCT_QUANTITY, tbp.BILL_PRODUCT_PRICE, tbp.BILL_DELIVERY_METHOD, tbp.BILL_STATUS, tbp.BILL_COOKING_TIME, tsp.USER_NUM as SELL_USER_NUM, DATE_FORMAT(tb.BILL_ORDER_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as Bill_ORDER_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(tb.BILL_ORDER_DATE,'%H:%i') as Bill_ORDER_DATE_TIME, tb.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS, tb.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DETAIL, tb.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS_POST_NUM, tsp.SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, tu.USER_PHONE, tsp.SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_METHOD, tsp.SELL_PRODUCT_SHIPPING_METHOD, tsp.SELL_PRODUCT_PICKUP from TBL_BILLS_PRODUCT tbp left join tbl_sell_product tsp on tbp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = tsp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM left join TBL_BILLS tb on tbp.BILL_ORDER_NUM = tb.BILL_ORDER_NUM left join tbl_user tu on tb.USER_NUM = tu.USER_NUM
where tbp.BILL_STATUS = 0
where tbp.BILL_STATUS = 1 OR tbp.BILL_STATUS = 2
where tbp.BILL_STATUS = 3 OR tbp.BILL_STATUS = -1
and tsp.USER_NUM = #{userNum} ORDER BY 1 DESC limit #{criteria.limit}, 4

select count(tbp.BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM) from TBL_BILLS_PRODUCT tbp left join tbl_sell_product tsp on tbp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = tsp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM
where tbp.BILL_STATUS = 0
where tbp.BILL_STATUS = 1 OR tbp.BILL_STATUS = 2
where tbp.BILL_STATUS = 3 OR tbp.BILL_STATUS = -1
and tsp.USER_NUM = #{userNum}
SELECT tb.USER_NUM as userNum, sell_product_num FROM TBL_BILLS_PRODUCT tbp join TBL_BILLS tb on tbp.BILL_ORDER_NUM = tb.BILL_ORDER_NUM WHERE BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM = #{billProductListNum}
